metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1990 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.Description:
A use-after-free flaw was found in ndlc_remove in drivers/nfc/st-nci/ndlc.cin the Linux Kernel. This flaw could allow an attacker to crash the systemdue to a race problem.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-1990` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.2.0-23-generic - 6.2.0-23.23
linux-image-6.2.0-23-generic-lpae - 6.2.0-23.23
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-23-generic - 6.2.0-23.23
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-23-generic-64k - 6.2.0-23.23
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1006-kvm - 6.2.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1005-aws - 6.2.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1005-azure - 6.2.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1007-gcp - 6.2.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-ibm - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1005-lowlatency - 6.2.0-1005.5
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1005-lowlatency-64k - 6.2.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1005-oracle - 6.2.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-6.2.0-1006-raspi - 6.2.0-1006.8
linux-image-6.2.0-1006-raspi-nolpae - 6.2.0-1006.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-23.23').
linux-kvm package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1006.6').
linux-aws package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1005.5').
linux-azure package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1005.5').
linux-gcp package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1007.7').
linux-ibm package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1003.3').
linux-lowlatency package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1005.5').
linux-oracle package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1005.5').
linux-raspi package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1006.8').
linux-allwinner: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was pending').
linux-starfive package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
